name: Energy Materials Industrial Research Initiative
membership: EMIRI is member of the K4I Association
goal: EMIRI (Energy Materials Industrial Research Initiative) is the leading industry-driven association representing the interests of more than 50 organisations (industry, research, associations) active in the field of advanced materials for low carbon energy and clean mobility. Our members represent at least 4 billion euro in sales of advanced materials for low carbon energy and clean mobility; they invest more than EUR 400 million annually in R&I and can mobilise several thousands of researchers and engineers. EMIRI contributes to the industrial leadership of EU-based developers, producers and key users of advanced materials for low carbon energy and clean mobility through shaping an appropriate industry and innovation policy framework based upon the SET-Plan and European Commission strategic long-term vision for a prosperous, modern, competitive and climate neutral economy by 2050.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives:
1. Horizon 2020 and forthcoming Horizon Europe research and innovation framework programmes (PPPs)
2. Energy Union
3. EU re-industrialisation
4. European Battery Alliance
